section.p: The activity that is captured within the data report of a subject's experience is organized by visit, by the subject's encounter with a study clinician. The encounter may be face to face, or it may be indirect, such as over the phone. All reported activity either takes place within the context of a study, or is associated with the visit (encounter) in which it is reported to the investigator.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that indicates the type or name of the vist. If this information is not formally condified, the value may be placed in the original text property of the coded data type. [SDTM: VISIT].

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The interval data type allows entry of the start date/time of the visit and of the end/date time. [SDTM: SVSTDTC, SVENDTC]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Adverse Event (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Sign (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.36)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text
A text block to be used for description of an unplanned visit. [SDTM: SVUPDES]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The clinical encounter number. It is a numeric value that is used for sorting. [SDTM, VISITNUM].

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the study day on which collection of the information was originally scheduled.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.65)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] substanceAdministration, where its type is Concomitant Medication
Contains exactly one [1..1] Concomitant Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.25.19)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] ECG Test Result (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.29)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Inclusion or Exclusion Criteria Not Met (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non-Human Laboratory Test Result (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Physical Examination Finding (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.33)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] substanceAdministration, where its type is Substance Use
Contains exactly one [1..1] Substance Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.22)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Microbiology Specimen Finding (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Microbiology Susceptibility (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pharmacokinetic Concentration Finding (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.41)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Accountability (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.37)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the study days associated with the beginning and end points of an activity that may extend over a period of time.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.70)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

The clinical encounter number. It is a numeric value that is used for sorting. [SDTM, VISITNUM].

A coded value that indicates the type or name of the vist. If this information is not formally condified, the value may be placed in the original text property of the coded data type. [SDTM: VISIT].
